<Text: Still Thinkin' 'bout You:  It was released on ABC/Dot Records in 1975.>

Text: Still Thinkin' 'bout You:  The album yielded two hit singles- "I Love the Blues and the Boogie Woogie", which went to #10, and "Still Thinkin' 'bout You", which went to #1.
Triplets:<Still Thinkin' 'bout You
"I Love the Blues and the Boogie Woogie"
